rubrics.requirements: Core Debugging Engine - Multi-architecture debugging system with comprehensive process control and memory management

sub_tasks.requirements: Process Lifecycle Management - Controls target process execution states and debugging sessions
Debug Session Control - Manages attachment, initialization, and termination of debugging sessions
Process attachment and detachment mechanisms with state validation
Debug initialization and cleanup procedures
Anti-debugging evasion capabilities to hide debugger presence
Execution Control Engine - Implements comprehensive execution flow control
Single-step execution modes (into, over, out) with exception awareness
Continuous execution with pause/resume capabilities
Instruction undo and reverse execution support
Thread Management System - Controls and monitors multiple execution threads
Thread lifecycle operations (create, suspend, resume, terminate)
Thread context switching and priority management
Thread-specific debugging state tracking
Memory Management Subsystem - Comprehensive virtual memory operations and analysis
Memory Access Layer - Provides safe read/write operations with validation
Safe memory read/write with bounds checking
Memory allocation and deallocation in target process
Page protection and rights management
Memory Layout Analysis - Tracks and analyzes virtual memory structure
Virtual memory region enumeration and analysis
Module base address resolution and tracking
Memory dump generation and export capabilities
OS-Level Integration - System-level debugging capabilities and privilege management
Privilege escalation and management for system-level debugging
Handle manipulation and system resource access
JIT debugger registration and management

rubrics.requirements: Breakpoint Management System - Comprehensive multi-type breakpoint engine with advanced conditional logic

sub_tasks.requirements: Multi-Type Breakpoint Engine - Implements various breakpoint mechanisms
Software Breakpoints - INT3-based execution breakpoints with collision management
Instruction patching and restoration mechanism
Breakpoint collision detection and management
Hardware Breakpoints - CPU debug register utilization
Debug register allocation and management
Access type specification (read, write, execute)
Memory Breakpoints - Page-based memory access monitoring
Memory page protection manipulation for monitoring
Range-based memory monitoring
Exception Breakpoints - Exception-based debugging triggers
Library Breakpoints - DLL load/unload event handling
Conditional Logic Engine - Advanced breakpoint logic and automation
Expression Evaluation System - Runtime condition checking
Boolean expression parser and evaluator for breakpoint conditions
Context-aware variable, register, and memory value resolution
Hit Count Management - Breakpoint frequency control
Hit counter tracking and reset mechanisms
Conditional hit count thresholds
Automated Actions - Script execution and logging on breakpoint hits
Command execution engine for breakpoint actions
Logging and output generation system
Silent breakpoint execution (no UI interruption)

rubrics.requirements: Code Analysis and Disassembly Engine - Multi-architecture instruction analysis with static and dynamic capabilities

sub_tasks.requirements: Disassembly Engine - Multi-architecture instruction decoding and assembly
Instruction Decoder - Raw bytes to assembly conversion
x86/x64 instruction set support with extensions
Instruction length calculation and validation
Operand analysis and addressing mode resolution
Assembly Engine - Assembly to machine code conversion
Runtime instruction patching capabilities
Instruction encoding validation
Static Analysis Engine - Code structure and flow analysis without execution
Control Flow Analysis - Program structure understanding
Function boundary detection and basic block identification
Loop detection and structure analysis
Branch destination calculation and control flow mapping
Cross-Reference Analysis - Code relationship mapping
Reference tracking and enumeration for code and data
Call graph construction and analysis
Dynamic Analysis Capabilities - Runtime behavior analysis and tracing
Execution Tracing Engine - Runtime execution recording and playback
Instruction trace recording to specified file formats
Conditional tracing with intelligent filtering
Trace coverage analysis and logic differentiation
Search and Pattern Matching - Advanced search capabilities across memory and code
Memory Search Engine - Pattern finding in process memory
Binary pattern search with wildcards
String search (ASCII/Unicode) with encoding detection
GUID pattern recognition and search
Code Search Engine - Assembly instruction and reference finding
Assembly instruction pattern matching
Reference and cross-reference enumeration

rubrics.requirements: Symbol and Data Type Management - Comprehensive symbolic information and user-defined type system

sub_tasks.requirements: Symbol Management System - Debug symbol loading and resolution
Symbol Loading Engine - External symbol file management
PDB symbol loading and management
Symbol download and caching system
User-Defined Type System - Custom data type definition and visualization
Data Type Engine - Memory interpretation and type definition
Primitive type definitions (byte, word, dword, qword)
Complex type definitions (structures, unions, function signatures)
String type handling (ASCII, Unicode)
Floating-point type support
Type Visualization - Memory data interpretation display
Type-aware memory dump formatting
Structure member expansion and navigation
Annotation Database - Persistent user metadata storage
Annotation Management - User-defined code annotations
Label management system for address naming
Comment system for code documentation
Bookmark system for important locations
Function Metadata - Function signature and argument tracking
Function definition and boundary management
Argument type and name annotation
Database Persistence - Save/load user analysis data
Database serialization and deserialization
Database clearing and reset operations

rubrics.requirements: Scripting and Automation Framework - Comprehensive automation system with expression evaluation

sub_tasks.requirements: Expression Evaluation Engine - Mathematical and logical expression processing
Expression Parser - Complex expression evaluation with context awareness
Arithmetic, bitwise, and logical operation support
Register, flag, memory address, and symbol value resolution
Built-in function library for advanced queries and manipulations
Variable Management - User-defined variable storage and scope handling
Script Execution Engine - Built-in scripting language runtime
Script Language Parser - Command interpretation and execution
Control flow statements (conditionals, loops, jumps)
Function call and return mechanisms
Script loading from files and direct command execution
Script Debugging - Script execution control and monitoring
Script breakpoint management
Step-by-step script execution

rubrics.requirements: Plugin and Extensibility Architecture - Comprehensive third-party extension framework

sub_tasks.requirements: Plugin Lifecycle Management - Dynamic library loading and management
Plugin discovery and loading mechanisms
Plugin unloading and cleanup procedures
Plugin API Bridge - Interface between plugins and core systems
Debug Engine API - Core debugging functionality exposure
Complete debugger engine API access for plugins
Shared memory and data marshalling between components
Event System - Plugin notification and callback management
Event-driven callbacks for debugger events (process creation, breakpoint hit)
Plugin registration system for event handling
UI Integration - Plugin interface extension capabilities
Custom menu and toolbar integration
Plugin window and tab management
Command-line auto-completion extension

rubrics.requirements: User Interface and Visualization System - Multi-view debugging interface with real-time state synchronization

sub_tasks.requirements: View Management System - Multiple debugging perspective coordination
Disassembly View - Code visualization and navigation
Syntax highlighting and instruction formatting
Address navigation and goto functionality
Code folding and organization features
Memory and Data Views - Memory visualization and editing
Hexadecimal dump with ASCII representation and editing
Multiple dump windows for comparison
Stack memory dump with frame analysis and call trace
Register and System State Views - CPU state visualization
General-purpose register display and editing
FPU and SIMD register visualization
Flag register state indication
Specialized Views - Symbols, threads, and references
Symbol browser and management interface
Thread list and management interface
Reference and search result display with navigation
Graph Visualization - Control flow and call graph display
Interactive control flow graph generation and rendering
Graph navigation, zoom controls, and export functionality
State Synchronization Mechanism - Real-time UI updates and debugging state reflection
Engine-to-GUI event propagation for state changes
Performance-optimized update management with selective refresh
Watch and Monitor System - Variable and expression monitoring
Watch expression management and real-time evaluation
Value change detection and notification
User Input and Command Processing - Command line and UI interaction handling

rubrics.requirements: Configuration and Integration Management - System configuration and external tool integration

sub_tasks.requirements: Configuration Management - Settings and preference handling
System-wide settings and configuration persistence
Event handling configuration and customization
External Tool Integration - Third-party tool and utility support
Scylla import reconstruction integration
External utility integration and workflow support
